title: GET_PED_HEAD_OVERLAY_DATA
content:
0xC46EE605// GetPedHeadOverlayData
BOOL GET_PED_HEAD_OVERLAY_DATA(Ped ped, int index, int* overlayValue, int* colourType, int* firstColour, int* secondColour, float* overlayOpacity);Parameters:ped: The target pedindex: Overlay indexoverlayValue: Overlay value pointercolourType: Colour type pointerfirstColour: First colour pointersecondColour: Second colour pointeroverlayOpacity: Opacity pointerReturns: Returns ped's head overlay data.A getter for SET_PED_HEAD_OVERLAY and _SET_PED_HEAD_OVERLAY_COLOR natives.Examples:Lua-- getting beard overlay data
local success, overlayValue, colourType, firstColour, secondColour, overlayOpacity = GetPedHeadOverlayData(PlayerPedId(), 1)
if success then
  -- incrementing value
  SetPedHeadOverlay(PlayerPedId(), 1, overlayValue + 1, overlayOpacity)
end
codeBlocks:
// GetPedHeadOverlayData
BOOL GET_PED_HEAD_OVERLAY_DATA(Ped ped, int index, int* overlayValue, int* colourType, int* firstColour, int* secondColour, float* overlayOpacity);

-- getting beard overlay data
local success, overlayValue, colourType, firstColour, secondColour, overlayOpacity = GetPedHeadOverlayData(PlayerPedId(), 1)
if success then
  -- incrementing value
  SetPedHeadOverlay(PlayerPedId(), 1, overlayValue + 1, overlayOpacity)
end
